title: Madcap Mulligan Jokes for Kids: Volume I
description: OVER 500 wildly funny clean jokes for kids... and adults! Madcap Mulligan Jokes for Kids will have children laughing aloud and rolling on the floor. Children, teachers, parents, and grandparents have shared these fun jokes. Great gift for kids. Jokes can be educational. They are great for learning vocabulary and English. Many of these jokes contain synonyms and homophones that create fun learning opportunities. Madcap I can't do puzzles with the teacher anymore. Why not? Madcap She said she can't find any piece when I'm around. If the boy next door had five apples and you left him two what would you have? Madcap One angry neighbor. What is a bull that always tells the truth? Believe a bull. Order now and start the laughs!
author: D.K. Nanook
